method: In a bowl, whisk together the olive oil, soy sauce, honey, minced garlic, ginger paste, salt, and pepper to make the marinade.
Thread the chopped cactus and pineapple onto skewers, alternating between the two.
Place the skewers in a dish and pour the marinade over them, turning to coat evenly.
Let the skewers marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to overnight in the refrigerator.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Grill the skewers for 4-6 minutes, turning occasionally, until the cactus and pineapple are lightly charred and tender.
Serve the skewers hot as an appetizer or side dish.
Enjoy your Cactus and Pineapple Skewers!
